title: Support sent broken links
content:
Hi,
My Pixel 3 XL stopped recognize any earphones that I connect to it. I've contacted Google support and did all they told me including factory reset and safe mode. Nothing worked so the suggested to replace my phone.
Since than, they are sending me broken links (So I can't order a replacement device) and telling me that a supervisor will contact me but nothing happens...
What can I do?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
